TopicTitle: help with textures unlimited recolor depot

Articles.Content:
i tried to down load TURD to improve my crafts but whenever  i try to open the recoloring window i doesn't show any recoloring textures and it only a blank window with a few words

P.S. when i right-click   on the mk-1 cockpit, it only has the default recoloring textures

See this link below for how to self-check some mod issues, and if that still doesn't work it has instructions to post your "log file" so other people can see details about your KSP and mod installation.
